panels.description: Response time in the last 24 hours.

targets.query:
keeps = if "${Port}" == "All" then ["_time", "_value", "port"] else ["_time", "_value"]

from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(
  fn: (r) => if "${Port}" == "All" then 
    r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time" and (r["path"] == "${access_file}" or "${access_file}" == "All")
  else
    r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time" and r["port"] == "${Port}" and (r["path"] == "${access_file}" or "${access_file}" == "All")
  )
  |> keep(columns: keeps)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

panels.title: Response time [port: $Port | log: $access_file]

targets.query:
from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time" and (r["path"] == "${access_file}" or "${access_file}" == "All") and (r["port"] == "${Port}" or "${Port}" == "All"))
|> group(columns: ["resp_code"], mode: "by")
|> count()
|> keep(columns: ["resp_code", "_value"])
|> rename(columns: {_value: ""})

from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time" and (r["path"] == "${access_file}" or "${access_file}" == "All") and (r["port"] == "${Port}" or "${Port}" == "All"))
|> group(columns: ["http_version"], mode: "by")
|> count()
|> keep(columns: ["http_version", "_value"])
|> rename(columns: {_value: "HTTP "})

from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time" and (r["path"] == "${access_file}" or "${access_file}" == "All") and (r["port"] == "${Port}" or "${Port}" == "All"))
|> group(columns: ["verb"], mode: "by")
|> count()
|> keep(columns: ["verb", "_value"])
|> rename(columns: {_value: ""})

import "join"

left = from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time" and (r["path"] == "${access_file}" or "${access_file}" == "All"))
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> keep(columns: ["_time", "resp_time"])
|> group(columns: ["_time"])

right = from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: -24h)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "agent" and (r["path"] == "${access_file}" or "${access_file}" == "All"))
|> group(columns: ["_time"])

join.right(
    left: left,
    right: right,
    on: (l, r) => l._time == r._time,
    as: (l, r) => ({r with resp_time: l.resp_time}),
)
|> group()
|> drop(columns: ["_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "port",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Port
list.name: Port
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "port",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: -24h)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time")
|> group(columns: ["path"])
|> distinct(column: "path")
|> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.label: Access file
list.name: access_file

|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "access" and r["_field"] == "resp_time")

|> distinct(column: "path")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "apache_bucket")
|> range(start: -24h)
|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "error" and r["_field"] == "message")
|> group(columns: ["level"])
|> distinct(column: "level")
|> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.label: Error level
list.name: error_loglevel
list.query:
